channel.title: Bigdata on Haowen`s Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Bigdata on Haowen`s Blog

item.description: “Big data is a field that treats ways to analyze, systematically extract information from, or otherwise deal with data sets that are too large or complex to be dealt with by traditional data-processing application software” ​ —— Wikipedia Characterizing Big Data The 3 Vs of Big Data Volume Challenges for traditional IT infrastructures Large amounts of data, low capacity to process it
